meanings.sent1: The whooshing wind blew through the trees.
meanings.sent2: I heard a whooshing noise as the car sped by.
meanings.sent3: The whooshing sound of the waterfall made me want to dance.
meanings.sent4: The whooshing river carried away all my worries.
meanings.sent5: The whooshing train passed by in a blur of motion.

meanings.definition: Moving quickly with a rushing sound.
meanings.sent1: The whooshing rocket soared into the sky.
meanings.sent2: The whooshing sound of the plane taking off filled the air.
meanings.sent3: The whooshing roller coaster ride left me breathless.
meanings.sent4: The whooshing cars on the highway seemed like a river of metal.
meanings.sent5: The whooshing bullet flew through the air with incredible speed.
